name: Shop Simulator 2020
description:
Your new shop is open!!!

How to play:

  • Add items to the stands to sell
  • Sell those items
  • Buy items from the sellers
  • Survive until the next day
  • You will lose the items that aren't sold in the day! Be careful!

It loosely follows the theme as you need to keep the shop "alive" or you will lose.
Worked alone but couldn't finish in time for the compo.
Took some "inspiration" for the graphics. Blame my chat for that
